game.title: Minetest Game

long_description:
# STG Texture Pack (Local Testing)  
A simple texture pack for STG Local Testing. (px:128+)   

STG: Simple Town Game.  

## Important Notice  
This texture pack is used for testing by mtvisitor since 2023.11.18.  

This texture pack support minetest_game before simpletown_game is ready.  

## Done Textures  

Texture Effects:  
- Round Shape of Sun and Moon,  
- Default apple and stick texture Provided.  
- Game Pause Menu Form Background Picture Changed.  

There are 3 sub folders:  
sky, default and backup  

CHANGELOG.md was included in this texture package.  

## ToDo Textures  

- Update default_wood in default folder.  
- Update torch texture in default folder.  
  (static and dynamic)  

## Game Support  
The following games are supported:  

- Minetest Game  

## Mod Support  
In addition to this game, the following mods are supported:  

- None  

## Contact  
For questions, requests, and other communications regarding this work, you can  
contact the original creator at crane_zhou@163.com  

If there are some license issues, please also let the author(mtvisitor) know.  

## License & CopyRight  
This Project is released under the terms of the BSD license.   
See LICENSE_BSD_3.txt in the package for more information or see:   
https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause.
